        <message>Use the function makeReadonly() to make gliderecord object readonly and use isReadonly() to check if the gliderecord object is readonly

```javascript
function getGR(readOnly) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord("incident");
    gr.addEncodedQuery("active=true");
    if (readOnly) {
        gr.makeReadonly();
    }
    gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        return gr;
    }
}

var gr = getGR(true);
gs.info(gr.number + "-" + gr.isReadonly());

var gr1 = getGR(false);
gs.info(gr1.number + "-" + gr1.isReadonly());
```</message>
